column4: how can i disable desktop from automatically displaying my local drive and usb flashdrive when i plug or open it?
how can i disable desktop from automatically displaying my local drive and usb flashdrive when i plug or open it?
If you use GNOME, open a terminal and type gconf-editor
go to desktop, (under nautilus) and uncheck volumes_visible
after desktop, i only have gnome.
It's a bit weird, but it isn't under Desktop directly
sorry, in case you didn't get that, apps > nautilus > desktop
i' on it.
what will i do next?
Okay, at the end of the right pane, there's an option called volumes_visible
Uncheck it, and your volumes wont show on your desktop
am i going to uncheck it?
yeah :)
thanks
no problem
Sorry, I think the closest you'll get is keeping them aligned
